metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Use the else statement to specify a block of code to be executed if the condition is False .
content.html: Use the else statement to specify a block of code to be executed if the condition is False.

content.code_html:
if (condition)
{
  // block of code to be executed if the condition is True
} 
else 
{
  // block of code to be executed if the condition is False
}

int time = 20;
if (time < 18) 
{
  Console.WriteLine("Good day.");
} 
else 
{
  Console.WriteLine("Good evening.");
}
// Outputs "Good evening."

content.text: In the example above, time (20) is greater than 18, so the condition is False . Because of this, we move on to the else condition and print to the screen "Good evening". If the time was less than 18, the program would print "Good day".
content.html: In the example above, time (20) is greater than 18, so the condition is False. Because of this, we move on to the else condition and print to the screen "Good evening". If the time was less than 18, the program would print "Good day".
